text:
Kite | Software Engineer | Onsite - Downtown San Francisco

Help us build the future of programming at Kite (kite.com) -- we're using machine learning to eliminate the repetitive parts of writing code. Watch our demo here: goo.gl/d7RkUT.

Open positions for senior full stack/backend engineers and senior machine learning engineers. Check us out at kite.com, apply on Angel List (angel.co/kite-8), or drop me a line at a@kite.com

-- Adam
